text_logic_form: Point $X$ is the midpoint of one of the legs of the trapezoid.
Point $Y$ is the midpoint of the other leg of the trapezoid.
Find the length of the line $DE$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Point $X$ is the midpoint of one of the legs of the trapezoid.
Point $Y$ is the midpoint of the other leg of the trapezoid.
Find the length of the line $DE$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $XY$ is $20$ units.
The length of the line $HG$ is $32$ units.
line_instances: There are lines $HD$, $HX$, $HG$, $DX$, $DE$, $XY$, $GY$, $GE$, and $YE$ in the trapezoid.
